scripts.build-dev:h5: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=dev NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=h5 vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build-dev:mp-weixin: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=dev NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build-test:app-plus: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=test NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=app-plus vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build-test:h5: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=test NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=h5 vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build-test:mp-weixin: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=test NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:app-plus: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=prod NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=app-plus vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:h5: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=prod NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=h5 vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:mp-weixin: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=prod NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.preview-dev:mp-weixin: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=dev NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build && node upload.js --robot=2
scripts.preview-test:mp-weixin: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=test NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build && node upload.js --robot=2
scripts.preview:mp-weixin: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=prod NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build && node upload.js --robot=2
scripts.cz: npm run log && git add . && git cz
scripts.dev: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=dev NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --watch
scripts.dev:app-plus: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=dev NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=app-plus vue-cli-service uni-build --watch
scripts.dev:h5: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=dev NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=h5 vue-cli-service uni-serve
scripts.dev:mp-weixin: cross-env VUE_APP_ENV=dev NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --watch
